channel.title: range on Mark Gingrass Blog
channel.description: Recent content in range on Mark Gingrass Blog

item.title: Dynamic Ranges and Modifying Recorded Macros
item.description: Build Templates In this tutorial, we will build upon the use of ranges and combine recording macros with modifying your own macros. In this tutorial you will learn the basics of: Adding formulas from VBA to Excel Dynamic Ranges Modifying Recorded Macros Selection object Watch the Video for step by step instructions. [embed]https://youtu.be/q8u4BlB2D2g[/embed] Code Copy and paste the code below to get you started.

item.title: Useful Excel Template Building with VBA Range Methods and Objects!
item.description: Learn practical code now! Begin using this code immediately in the workforce! This tutorial will guide you through the use of ranges and how to extract values from cells and input values into cells. In this tutorial you will learn the basics of: Option Explicit - Why use it? Range - Useful for template building and more. Objects - What are they and tell me more!
